Contact the City

The City recently partnered with TextMyGov to allow you to sign up to receive text alerts from the City.
  • - to receive City-wide emergency alerts (recommended!)
  • - to receive information about City-wide events (non-emergency)
View TextMyGov's terms and privacy policy at https://textmygov.com/opt-in-terms-conditions/ This same program allows you find information and report issues easily by text as well! Try it today - Text "Hi" to 210.853.2003 . For a full listing of words for reports and information you can visit here .
